definitions.text: cause to come to know personally
examples: permit me to acquaint you with my son
introduce the new neighbors to the community

definitions.text: bring something new to an environment
examples: A new word processor was introduced

definitions.text: bring in a new person or object into a familiar environment
examples: He brought in a new judge
The new secretary introduced a nasty rumor

definitions.text: bring in or establish in a new place or environment

examples: insert a picture into the text

definitions.text: bring before the public for the first time, as of an actor, song, etc.
furnish with a preface or introduction
examples: She always precedes her lectures with a joke
He prefaced his lecture with a critical remark about the institution
The fall of the Berlin Wall ushered in the post-Cold War period
